alert.note: Alert for Gallatin; Madison (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 6:06PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Madison and eastern Gallatin Counties through 630 PM MDT... At 603 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from the Bridger Mountains southwest to near Raynolds Pass. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bozeman, Belgrade, Big Sky, Four Corners, Bozeman Hot Springs, Yellowstone Village and Gallatin Gateway. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between mile markers 299 and 321. Highway 191 between mile markers 6 and 10, and between mile markers 31 and 87. Highway 287 between mile markers 1 and 27. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Occasional cloud to ground lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
